body: Hello! I'm the translator of this doujin! ||||| Raw (p111-130): ||||| https://e-hentai.org/g/1325302/c2329e86be/ ||||| Fonts: ||||| CCComicCrazy, Anime Ace. ||||| Japanese Clothing Terms:||||| Sarashi - A binding cloth wrapped around the body. In this context, it's wrapped around the breasts. Hakama - Traditional Japanese trousers. ||||| Want to commission an untranslated doujin? Contact me at defski@cock.li OR twitter.com/linkzor8! |||||
